name: Final Fantasy XI: Treasures of Aht Urhgan
name_original: Final Fantasy XI: Treasures of Aht Urhgan
description:
Final Fantasy XI: Treasures of Aht Urhgan is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by Square Enix. It came out on 18-04-2006. It was published by Square Enix. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
Final Fantasy XI: Treasures of Aht Urhgan is available on PC.
Akihiko Matsui and Hiromichi Tanaka produced the game. It was directed by Akihiko Matsui, Koichi Ishii, Koichi Ogawa and Mizuki Ito. It was scored by Kumi Tanioka, Naoshi Mizuta and Nobuo Uematsu.
